function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High mobility leading to increased spread of contagious diseases like malaria","Impact":"Greater regional impact on relative rates of case importation in areas with high mobility","Mitigation":"Implement targeted control measures on areas with high mobility to reduce disease spread","Technologies":"Location-based tracking, mobile data analysis","People":"Residents in high-mobility areas, communities at risk of contagious diseases","Owner":"Health authorities, data analysts, policy makers"},{"Description":"Differences in movement patterns impacting regional spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Substantial difference in regional impact on relative rates of case importation in areas with different movement patterns","Mitigation":"Test and guide attack strategies based on movement patterns to target control measures effectively","Technologies":"Data visualization, predictive modeling, testing strategies","People":"Communities at risk of contagious diseases, health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Policy makers, researchers, health authorities"},{"Description":"Intervention in high-mobility areas can substantially reduce disease impact","Impact":"Reduction in disease impact across a wide region, with most impact within the disease movement community","Mitigation":"Implement interventions in high-mobility areas to reduce disease impact","Technologies":"Location-based mapping, intervention planning","People":"Residents in high-mobility areas, communities at risk of contagious diseases","Owner":"Health authorities, policy makers, intervention planners"}]}
